question: What is Unilife Riverside House?
answer: Unilife Riverside House is a private student accommodation located in Guildford, offering 99 modern and fully-equipped studios with river views, providing a personalised living experience for students.

question: What types of student accommodation does Unilife Riverside House offer?
answer: Riverside House offers a range of studio types, including Classic, Premium, Premium Plus, Luxury, Luxury Plus, and Luxury VIP studios, catering to different needs and preferences. Each studio comes with modern furnishings, Wi-Fi, Smart TV, kitchenette, and ensuite bathroom.

question: Is Unilife Riverside House suitable for both undergraduate and postgraduate students?
answer: Yes, Riverside House is suitable for both undergraduate and postgraduate students. Any full time student can stay at Riverside House.

question: How many rooms are available in Riverside House?
answer: Riverside House has 99 studios available for students, offering a range of accommodations from single to dual occupancy studios.

question: How many floors are there in Riverside House?
answer: There are 5 floors in total at Riverside House.

question: How can I make an inquiry about availability at Riverside House?
answer: You can make an inquiry about availability by contacting Riverside House via phone +447802322917, email yourspace@unilife.co.uk, or messaging through WhatsApp, WeChat, Facebook Messenger, or FaceTime.

question: How do I apply for accommodation at Riverside House?
answer: You can book your accommodation directly through the Unilife website or by contacting the Unilife sales team via email or phone for assistance with the process.

question: How can I cancel or modify my booking at Riverside House?
answer: If your preferred studio type is sold out on the website, please contact the sales team who will confirm the procedure to go onto the waiting list.

question: Is there a waiting list for available rooms at Riverside House?
answer: Please contact the sales team who will confirm the procedure to go onto the waiting list.

question: How far in advance should I book my room at Riverside House?
answer: It is recommended to book as early as possible, especially during peak periods, to secure your preferred room type and location.

question: Can I stay during the summer months, or is it only available during term time
answer:
?
Yes, Riverside House is open all year round and the Unilife team will be here to support you throughout your stay!

question: Does Riverside House accept international students?
answer: Yes, Riverside House is open to international students and provides a supportive environment tailored to their needs.

question: How do I confirm my booking after applying for a room at Riverside House?
answer: Confirming your booking at Riverside House is simple! After submitting your application, all you need to do is sign your contract and pay the deposit. Once that’s done, the property manager will review your tenancy and co-sign the agreement, finalising everything. You’ll then receive an email notification with your official assured shorthold tenancy agreement attached.

question: Is there a minimum lease term for rooms at Riverside House?
answer: Riverside House offers contracts from 45-51 weeks.

question: What is the check-in and check-out procedure?
answer: Check-in is simple. One of the Unilife team will get in touch to arrange your arrival time and date to ensure one of the Unilife team is available to welcome you into the property, checking out will follow the same procedure one of the Unilife Team will contact you to arrange your departure.

question: Can I rebook the same studio for the following year?
answer: Yes, absolutely! As a current resident, you’ll have priority booking for your room, ensuring you get first choice. Plus, we offer you the best available rate, making it even easier to secure your favourite studio for the following year.

question: Where is Riverside House located?
answer: Riverside House is located on Walnut Tree Close, Guildford, GU1 4TX, by the River Wey in Guildford, England.

question: How far is Riverside House from the University of Surrey?
answer: Riverside House is located on Walnut Tree Close so it is just a 4-minute walk from the University of Surrey, making it very convenient for students attending the university.

question: How far is the Winchester School of Art from Riverside House?
answer: The Winchester School of Art is located in Winchester, which is approximately a 50 minute drive from Riverside House in Guildford.

question: Are there any grocery stores or supermarkets near Riverside House?
answer: Guildford Riverside house is a 10 minute walk from the high street and a 10 minute walk to the local shop. There is a Lidl superstore at the end of Walnut Tree Close. There is also a Tesco and Waitrose convenience store located by the town center. Both supermarkets are approximately five minutes walk.

question: Is Riverside House close to public transport links?
answer: Yes, Riverside House is well connected by public transport. Guildford Train Station is just a seven minute walk away, offering direct train links to London and surrounding areas. Additionally, there are bus stops nearby.

question: How far is the nearest bus stop from Riverside House?
answer: The nearest bus stop to Riverside House is located in the town center, approximately a ten minute walk.

question: How far is the train station from Riverside House?
answer: Guildford Train Station is located at the end of Walnut Tree Close and it is a seven minute walk, making it very convenient to get a direct train to London and surrounding areas.

question: Is Riverside House located near any recreational areas or parks?
answer: Riverside House is located on the national trusts River Wey, offering tranquil river views. There is also a river footpath, offering a scenic and peaceful walk into the town center. There are also parks and open spaces within walking distance, such as Guildford’s Stoke Park to enjoy.

question: What are the nearby landmarks around Riverside House?
answer: Nearby tourist landmarks include Guildford Cathedral, Guildford Castle, and the River Wey, which offers a picturesque setting for relaxation and outdoor activities.

question: Are there any shopping centres or malls near Riverside House?
answer: Yes, Guildford’s Friary Shopping Centre is a short ten minute walk offering a variety of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options.

question: How long does it take to walk to the city centre from Riverside House?
answer: It takes just a short 10-minute walk from Riverside House to the heart of Guildford’s vibrant city centre. Here, you’ll find a fantastic selection of shops, cafes, restaurants, bars, and leisure activities—everything you need to enjoy your student life to the fullest!

question: Is the area around Riverside House considered safe?
answer: Yes, the area around Riverside House is considered very safe and peaceful, with good lighting and a strong sense of student community as it is very close to the University. Guildford is generally regarded as a safe town for students and residents.

question: What are the local neighbourhoods like around Riverside House?
answer: The local neighbourhood around Riverside House is a mix of residential areas with scenic views, river paths, and green spaces, making it a peaceful and attractive environment for students.

question: How close is Riverside House to student-friendly bars, cafes, and restaurants?
answer: Riverside House is within a short 10 minute walk to several of the best student-friendly bars, clubs, cafes, and restaurants in Guildford’s city centre, just a short walk away.

question: Are there any places for student hangouts near Riverside House?
answer: Yes, there are many places for students to hang out as the property is very close to the town center.

question: Is Riverside House easily accessible for students with disabilities?
answer: Yes, Riverside House is designed to be accessible for students with disabilities. The building features accessible entrances, lifts, and facilities to ensure that all students can move around comfortably and safely. Please contact the sales team who will be able to help understand your requirements and provide assistance with the booking process.

question: What are the nearby restaurants to Riverside House?
answer: There are several restaurants within walking distance from Riverside House. Paul's Café is about a 12-minute walk or a 5-minute drive away. Hillside Food Court can be reached with a 9-minute walk. Lorenzo's Breakfast, Brunch & Lunch is around a 15-minute walk or a 5-minute drive from Riverside House.

question: Are there transport options to get to other parts of the city from Riverside House?
answer: Yes, there are plenty of public transport options from Riverside House. If you are looking to be picked up from the building, there are many taxi firms such as Surrey cars who are located on Walnut Tree Close. Guildford Train Station is just a seven minute walk away, offering direct links to various destinations. Additionally, the main Guildford bus stop nearby provides local routes around Guildford.

question: Can I use a bike to commute from Riverside House?
answer: Absolutely! Riverside House is bike-friendly, and cycling around Guildford is a fantastic option. The area boasts scenic, bike-friendly paths and routes, making your commute both easy and enjoyable. In fact, cycling along the river is particularly stunning, offering a beautiful, peaceful route for your daily journeys.

question: Does Riverside House have secure bike storage facilities?
answer: 6. Yes, Riverside House offers secure bike storage for residents. There is a dedicated space to safely store your bike, providing peace of mind for cyclists.

question: Are taxis or ride-sharing services easily accessible near Riverside House?
answer: Yes, taxis and ride-sharing services like Uber are easily accessible near Riverside House, with pick-up and drop-off points close by in Guildford. There is also Surrey Cars who are located on the same road as Riverside House.

question: How long does it take to get to London from Riverside House by train?
answer: It takes approximately 35-40 minutes by train from Guildford Station (near Riverside House) to London Waterloo. Trains are frequent and provide fast access to central London.

question: Is there parking available at Riverside House for residents?
answer: Riverside House does not offer on-site parking for residents.

question: How many parking spaces are available?
answer: There are limited spaces available at the front of the building for short term parking requests for visitors. Please speak to the property manager.

question: What are the car park charges?
answer: Please speak to the property manager.

question: Can I rent a parking space near Riverside House?
answer: Yes, there are various car parks available near Riverside House. Please speak to the property manager if you need any assistance locating a public car park.

question: Does Riverside House offer any shuttle services to nearby campuses?
answer: There is no requirement for us to provide a shuttle bus as our residents can enjoy a three minute walk to the campus.

question: What is the nearest airport to Riverside House?
answer: The nearest major airport to Riverside House is London Gatwick Airport, which is approximately 40 minutes by car or 45-50 minutes by train from Guildford. London Heathrow Airport is also relatively close, around a 45-minute drive.

question: What are the communal areas available at Riverside House?
answer: Riverside House offers state of the art communal areas designed to enhance your living experience. Socialise in the vibrant Social Hub, or challenge friends in our entertainment room, featuring an 85” TV, PS5, Nintendo Switch, and a karaoke machine for endless entertainment. We also have a pool table. For those focused moments, our study area with quiet study pods provides the perfect environment for productivity. If you enjoy cooking with other residents, the social kitchen is ideal as it is fully equipped with all appliances. You will also be able to stay active in our 24/7 gym, fully equipped with cardiovascular and resistance machines. Plus, our friendly on-site team at the reception is always ready to assist, and you can kick-start your day with a free grab-and-go breakfast at our breakfast bar, available Monday to Friday.

question: What is included in the social hub at Riverside House?
answer: The social hub at Riverside House includes an 85" Smart TV with access to Netflix, Sky Sports, and a PS5 for entertainment. There are also study areas, a pool table, and a social kitchen for residents to enjoy.

question: Does Riverside House have a cinema room?
answer: Yes, Riverside House features a cinema room, which is equipped with an 85" TV, Now TV, Netflix, and Sky Sports. It also has a PS5 and a karaoke machine for additional entertainment.

question: Are there study areas provided for residents?
answer: Yes, Riverside House offers designated study areas within the social hub and other communal spaces. These areas are quiet and equipped to help residents focus on their academic work.

question: What types of entertainment are available in the cinema room?
answer: The cinema room provides various forms of entertainment, including access to Now TV, Netflix, Sky Sports, and the PS5. It also features a karaoke machine for additional fun.

question: Are there common areas where I can meet other students?
answer: Yes, all of our communal areas provide a great opportunity to meet other residents in a relaxed environment.

question: Does Riverside House offer any outdoor recreational spaces?
answer: Yes, Riverside House offers an outdoor space with a patio, BBQ area, and comfortable seating. It provides residents with a relaxing place to enjoy the views of the River Wey and socialise with friends.

question: Is there a BBQ area available for residents?
answer: Yes, Riverside House has a BBQ area in the outdoor space where residents can cook and relax with friends during the warmer months.

question: Does Riverside House provide a gym?
answer: Yes, Riverside House features a state-of-the-art, 24/7 on-site gym, so you can work out whenever it suits you. Equipped with a range of cardiovascular machines and resistance weights, it’s the perfect place to stay fit and unwind after a busy day of studying or socialising.

question: What gym equipment is available at Riverside House?
answer: At Riverside House, our on site gym is equipped with state of the art fitness to help you achieve your goals. You will find a variety of cardiovascular machines, including running machines, cross trainers and rowing machines, perfect for an energising workout. Plus, we offer a fantastic selection of free weights.

question: Can I access the gym at any time of the day or night
answer:
?

answer: Yes, laundry rooms are open 24/7, 7 days a week for convenience.

question: How many washing machines and dryers are available for use?
answer: Riverside House has three washing machines and three tumble dryers to use.

question: What is the laundry charge?
answer: Laundry is made easy for residents at Riverside House, with a complimentary £100 laundry card provided on arrival, which can be used for washing and drying. If students require further credits, they can top up their account with AppWash.

answer: Unilife has its own Unilife mobile application that can be downloaded for free from the Apple Store or Google Play. Tenants are able to communicate directly with the property manager and also log any maintenance support tickets.

answer: Yes, Riverside House offers an electronic parcel delivery system where residents receive notifications through a mobile app once the parcel has arrived.

answer: Each resident is provided with a private mailbox for secure mail delivery.

question: Does Riverside House offer any meal services or dining options?
answer: Yes, residents can enjoy a complimentary Grab & Go breakfast from Monday to Friday, along with unlimited tea, coffee, and hot chocolate 7 days a week.

answer: The Reception is staffed by a City Manager and House Supervisor who are available daily to assist residents Monday to Friday. There is a 24 hour Unilife number if you need assistance out of hours.

question: What types of social events are hosted at Riverside House?
answer: Riverside House organises regular events, Events include welcome parties, film nights, games nights and cultural outings. If you have any event ideas or would like to suggest something, just let your property manager know, we are always happy to make your stay even more enjoyable.

question: Are there any regular fitness classes or activities offered?
answer: Yes, residents can enjoy regular fitness sessions with other residents in the onsite gym.

?

question: What is included in the Grab & Go breakfast?

question: How often are events held at Riverside House?

question: Are there social spaces where I can relax and watch TV

question: What is included in the studio apartment at Riverside House?
answer: Each studio apartment at Unilife Riverside House is fully furnished and includes a small double or double bed (depending on the studio type), a comfortable study desk with chest of drawers, a large fitted wardrobe, a private kitchenette, an ensuite bathroom, a smart TV with a TV licence, superfast 1,000 Mbps Wi-Fi, and all utility bills are covered.

A large, fitted wardrobe offers ample storage, while the fully equipped kitchenette allows you to prepare meals at your convenience. The ensuite bathroom adds an extra level of privacy and comfort, making your room the ideal space to relax, study, and enjoy your time at university!

?

question: Are the rooms at Riverside House suitable for couples or shared living?
answer: Yes, absolutely! We offer purpose-built studios for dual occupancy, perfect for friends or couples who want to share their living space. Each studio comes with a spacious double bed, two large wardrobes, and two study desks, ensuring plenty of room and comfort for both of you.

question: Is there a kitchenette in each room at Riverside House?

question: What is the response time for inquiries?
answer: The Unilife team will aim to respond to all enquiries on the same day.

question: How can I schedule a viewing of Riverside House?
answer: You can schedule a viewing by contacting the team via email or phone. Alternatively, you can use their live chat feature on the website to make arrangements.

question: Are there any social media platforms where I can contact Riverside House?
answer: Yes, you can visit the Unilife official accounts on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, WeChat and Whatsapp. Please search Unilife Student Living.

question: Is there a customer service or support line available at Riverside House?
answer: You can contact Riverside House via phone at +44 7802 322917 or email on yourspace@unilife.co.uk. If you are a current resident, you can contact the property manager directly from the Unilife mobile app.

question: Can I contact Riverside House through FaceTime for a tour or assistance?
answer: Yes absolutely, FaceTime is available as an option for virtual tours or assistance with any queries. Please reach out to us to book a virtual viewing!
